column3: str

Eshana needs you to borrow a griffin's wings.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Giff.
Use the griffin's Buffet ability on frenzied swarms.
Report to Eshana.
Ah, jussst the ssstrider I wanted to sssee. We have sssoldiers out on a joint training exercise, and they've sssent a requessst for aid.
As matters ssstand, you'll be needing a griffin to render the necessary assistance. Giff will explain the sssituation.

Here to lend a hand, are you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>? I don't know what Eshana's told you, but it seems our fighters are being swarmed by tiny flying vilekin. Actual <Emphasis>swarms</Emphasis> of them.
I don't know what our folk did to annoy them, but once those pests get riled up, there's no shooing them away.
My plan is for you to fly a griffin over to Virdjala, and have it disperse those biting buggers with a good buffet from its wings.
Once you're done, you can hop off wherever you please─the griffin's trained to return to me after the rider dismounts. Might be easiest if you report directly to Eshana, of course.
Hells-spawned fiends! There's a dozen more for every one I swat!
A swarm of vilekin is attacking this soldier. Speak with Giff in Castellum Velodyna and borrow a griffin for its Buffet ability.
I've ssslapped and ssswiped a hundred times but they won't leave him be!
Oof! Why did you─ Oh, they're gone! Thank Rhalgr!
...And thank <Emphasis>you</Emphasis>. If you hadn't come, my comrade here would have been bitten and stung to death.
Aye, not exactly the kind of training I signed up for. We'd best find a new place to spar.
Godsdamn these winged demons! Get away from me!
Go on! Shoo! ...Ugh, it'sss hopeless!
Phew... Thank you so much. I thought those little bastards would eat me alive...
Those pesssts ignored me and flew ssstraight at him. Curious. We'll head back for now, and have this ssstrider's wounds ssseen to.
Lost your griffin, did you? Here, try to stay in the saddle this time.
Was Giff's plan a sssuccess?
That is a relief. Being blasssted by a griffin's wings was likely unpleasant, but better that than sssuffer a ssslow death from a ssswarm.
（★未使用／削除予定★）

I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem. It is a wonder that you did not fall victim to the sssame fate.
I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem.
Ssspeaking of which, Giff is apparently terrified of those insssects. He mussst have been glad indeed that you arrived to perform the ressscue in his ssstead...
You've blown away those little buggers then, have you? Head over to Eshana and tell her the good news.
